name: Push World
author: Push World

sections.description:
Push notifications plugin for WordPress by PushWorld. It gives you an ability to collect subscribers and push notifications through Push World. It also have Woocommerce integration and can return users to abandoned cart and send push about orders status.

Features:

  • Supports Chrome, Firefox and Yandex Browser on both HTTP and HTTPS sites for Desctop and Android.

  • RSS to push – Send notifications to followers automatically.

  • Real Time Analytics – See real time statistic for subscription process and for push notifications delivery, clicks and conversion.

  • Reach Push – Push with 2 action buttons and big picture.

  • Native Widget on http websites – Native widget for http increase subscription conversion.

  • Scheduled Notifications – Сreate scheduled notifications to deliver push messages in the future.

  • Abandoned Cart Notifiaction – Send personal push message about abandoned cart
  • Order Status Notification – Send personal push notification about order status
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Push World screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Push World screen to configure the plugin

Is Push World service is free?

Yes it’s free for mass push notifications and paid for personal messages.

  • Woocommerce Integration

  • FAQ and Settings links

1.0.0

short_description: This plugin help send personal and mass push notifications. It also can return customers to abandoned WooCommerce cart through push notifications.
